QuestData.Title: Skeer the Bloodseeker
QuestData.Description: Our efforts to secure the shallows before Zan'vess have paid off.$B$BWe have spotted another paragon buried in amber, hidden in the waters to the southwest.$B$BAdding another paragon to our numbers is vital. Another champion from ages past could turn the tide in our favor.$B$BI would go immediately, but unfortunately, I am needed here.$B$BSince you are already a Wakener, you can carry out this task in my stead.
QuestData.LogDescription: Awaken Skeer the Bloodseeker in the underwater cave.
QuestData.RewardText: The hunger... they said it would be fierce, but I did not expect anything like this.$B$BIt is strange to feel so... weak.
